medicinal_herb.name: Medicinal Herb
medicinal_herb.description: Restores 30 HP to a single ally.

strong_medicine.name: Strong Medicine
strong_medicine.description: Restores 60 HP to a single ally.

special_medicine.name: Special Medicine
special_medicine.description: Restores 120 HP to a single ally.

amor_seco_essence.name: Amor Seco Essence
amor_seco_essence.description: Restores 50 to 60 HP to all allies.

single_phial.name: Single Phial
single_phial.description: Restores 10 MP to a single ally.

magic_water.name: Magic Water
magic_water.description: Restores 30 MP to a single ally.

sages_elixir.name: Sage's Elixir
sages_elixir.description: Restores 90 MP to a single ally.

antidotal_herb.name: Antidotal Herb
antidotal_herb.description: Cures a single ally of poison and severe poison.

moonwort_bulb.name: Moonwort Bulb
moonwort_bulb.description: Cures a single ally of paralysis.

smelling_salts.name: Smelling Salts
smelling_salts.description: Cures a single ally of confusion and sleep.

panacea.name: Panacea
panacea.description: Cures a single ally of any ailments that afflict them.

yggdrasil_leaf.name: Yggdrasil Leaf
yggdrasil_leaf.description: Revives a single fallen ally and restores half of their HP.

oomph_powder.name: Oomph Powder
oomph_powder.description: Greatly increases the attack of a single ally for 2 to 5 turns.

buffium.name: Buffium
buffium.description: Greatly increases the defence of a single ally for 4 to 7 turns.

acceleratonic.name: Acceleratonic
acceleratonic.description: Greatly increases the agility of a single ally for 4 to 7 turns.

pingium.name: Pingium
pingium.description: Greatly increases the wisdom of a single ally for 4 to 7 turns.

insulade.name: Insulade
insulade.description: Reduces the damage received by a single ally from breath attacks for 4 to 7 turns.

sag_powder.name: Sag Powder
sag_powder.description: Greatly lowers the attack of a single enemy for 2 to 5 turns.

sapperine.name: Sapperine
sapperine.description: Greatly lowers the defence of a single enemy for 4 to 7 turns.

deceleratonic.name: Deceleratonic
deceleratonic.description: Greatly lowers the agility of a single enemy for 4 to 7 turns.

dimium.name: Dimium
dimium.description: Greatly lowers the wisdom of a single enemy for 4 to 7 turns.

antimagic_powder.name: Antimagic Powder
antimagic_powder.description: Prevents a single enemy from using magic spells.

bad_medicine.name: Bad Medicine
bad_medicine.description: Inflicts a single enemy with a range of debilitating effects.

pretty_pebble.name: Pretty Pebble
pretty_pebble.description: A small stone that cannn sting quite sharply if thrown with enough force. Inflicts minor damage to a single enemy when used in battle.

monster_manure.name: Monster Manure
monster_manure.description: A pong deposit that can be pitched at one's opponents. Inflicts minor damage to a single enemy when used in battle.

pinball.name: Pinball
pinball.description: A sphere of the toughest stone that really hurts if it hits you. Inflicts minor damage to a single enemy when used in battle, including metallic monsters.

rockbomb_shard.name: Rockbomb Shard
rockbomb_shard.description: An unstable stone that explodes when it strikes its target. Almost kills a single enemy when used in battle, but the damage it inflicts will vary according to the target's resistance to instant death.

monster_munchies.name: Monster Munchies
monster_munchies.description: A meaty morsel that monsters love. Feed to a monster to very slightly increase the likelihood of it wanting to join you.

rarified_steak.name: Rarified Steak
rarified_steak.description: Odd offcuts, the origin of which may never be ascertained. Feed it to a monster to increase the likelihood of it wanting to join you by a random factor. Occasionally inflicts a status ailment.

meaty_treat.name: Meaty Treat
meaty_treat.description: A succulent cut that monsters go mad for. Feed to a monster to increase the likelihood of it wanting to join you.

mystery_meat.name: Mystery Meat
mystery_meat.description: Suspicious meat of unknown origin. Feed to a monster to increase the likelihood of it wanting to join you by a random factor.

smoked_sirloin.name: Smoked Sirloin
smoked_sirloin.description: A tender treat that monsters adore. Feed to a monster to slightly increase the likelihood of it wanting to join you.

manky_meat.name: Manky Meat
manky_meat.description: A piece of putrid flesh that exudes a sour stennch. Feed to a monster to very slightly increase the likelihood of it wanting to join you, but also poison it in the process.

bonus_ball.name: Bonus Ball
bonus_ball.description: Increases the amount of experience points and gold coins earned after battle by 1.5x. Effective for 10 battles. Only one of this item can be in effect at any one time.

bumper_bonus_ball.name: Bumper Bonus Ball
bumper_bonus_ball.description: Increases the amount of experience points and gold coins earned after battle by 2.0x. Effective for 25 battles. Only one of this item can be in effect at any one time.

metal_slimecard.name: Metal Slimecard
metal_slimecard.description: The timecard of a hardworking metal slime. Provides a small amount of 2000 additional experience points to a single ally.

liquid_metal_slimecard.name: Liquid Metal Slimecard
liquid_metal_slimecard.description: The timecard of an industrious liquid metal slime. Provides additional amount of 10000 additional experience points to a single ally.

king_metal_slimecard.name: King Metal Slimecard
king_metal_slimecard.description: The timecard of a workaholic metal slime. Provides a large amount of 70000 additional experience points to a single ally.

seasoning.name: Seasoning
seasoning.description: A phenomenal powder that hurries the onset of the following season. Cannot be used in places where the season does not normally change.

seed_of_life.name: Seed of Life
seed_of_life.description: Raises the max. HP of a single ally by 3. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its max. HP that cannot be exceeded.

super_seed_of_life.name: Super Seed of Life
super_seed_of_life.description: Raises the max. HP of a single ally by 10. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its max. HP that cannot be exceeded.

seed_of_strength.name: Seed of Strength
seed_of_strength.description: Raises the attack of a single ally by 3. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its attack that cannot be exceeded.

super_seed_of_strength.name: Super Seed of Strength
super_seed_of_strength.description: Raises the attack of a single ally by 10. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its attack that cannot be exceeded.

seed_of_resilience.name: Seed of Resilience
seed_of_resilience.description: Raises the defence of a single ally by 3. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its defence that cannot be exceeded.

super_seed_of_resilience.name: Super Seed of Resilience
super_seed_of_resilience.description: Raises the defence of a single ally by 10. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its defence that cannot be exceeded.

seed_of_agility.name: Seed of Agility
seed_of_agility.description: Raises the agility of a single ally by 3. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its agility that cannot be exceeded.

super_seed_of_agility.name: Super Seed of Agility
super_seed_of_agility.description: Raises the agility of a single ally by 10. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its agility that cannot be exceeded.

seed_of_wisdom.name: Seed of Wisdom
seed_of_wisdom.description: Raises the wisdom of a single ally by 3. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its wisdom that cannot be exceeded.

super_seed_of_wisdom.name: Super Seed of Wisdom
super_seed_of_wisdom.description: Raises the wisdom of a single ally by 10. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its wisdom that cannot be exceeded.

seed_of_magic.name: Seed of Magic
seed_of_magic.description: Raises the max. MP of a single ally by 3. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its max. MP that cannot be exceeded.

super_seed_of_magic.name: Super Seed of Magic
super_seed_of_magic.description: Raises the max. MP of a single ally by 10. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its max. MP that cannot be exceeded.

seed_of_skill.name: Seed of Skill
seed_of_skill.description: Provides a single ally with 3 additional talent points. Note that a monster can have a maximum of 999 available talent points.

super_seed_of_skill.name: Super Seed of Skill
super_seed_of_skill.description: Provides a single ally with 10 additional talent points. Note that a monster can have a maximum of 999 available talent points.

seed_of_growth.name: Seed of Growth
seed_of_growth.description: Raises the level of a single ally by 1.

defence_boosters_scroll_i.name: Defence Booster's Scroll I
defence_boosters_scroll_i.description: Teaches the Defence Booster I talent.

everyday_outfit.name: Everyday Outfit
everyday_outfit.description: Rugged red apparel that's perfect for everyday wear.

cake_makers_clobber.name: Cake-Maker's Clobber
cake_makers_clobber.description: A pristine white uniform worn by cake creators.

gothic_vestment.name: Gothic Vestment
gothic_vestment.description: A classy coat that keeps out the cold.

monstrous_mail.name: Monstrous Mail
monstrous_mail.description: Armour with a sinister appearance, worn only by monsterkind's mightiest trendsetters.

burgundy_gothic_vestment.name: Burgundy Gothic Vestment
burgundy_gothic_vestment.description: A classy coat that keeps out the cold. Now available in burgundy!

mini_medal.name: Mini Medal
mini_medal.description: Collectible medals that can be swapped with the medallist for an array of prizes. Drop by their counter in the Maulosseum in the lower echelon of the Circle of Conquest to see what's on offer.

red_travelite.name: Red Travelite
red_travelite.description: A red crystal that was forged by the ancient elves. It contains a magical energy that allows travel to previously inaccessible areas of Nadiria.

yellow_travelite.name: Yellow Travelite
yellow_travelite.description: A yellow crystal that was forged by the ancient elves. It contains a magical energy that allows travel to previously inaccessible areas of Nadiria.

green_travelite.name: Green Travelite
green_travelite.description: A green crystal that was forged by ancient elves. It contains a magical energy that allows travel to previously inaccessible areas of Nadiria.

indigo_travelite.name: Indigo Travelite
indigo_travelite.description: An indigo crystal that was forged by ancient elves. It contains a magical energy that allows travel to previously inaccessible areas of Nadiria.

pink_travelite.name: Pink Travelite
pink_travelite.description: A pink crystal that was forged by ancient elves. It contains a magical energy that allows travel to previously inaccessible areas of Nadiria.

purple_travelite.name: Purple Travelite
purple_travelite.description: A purple crystal that was forged by ancient elves. It contains a magical energy that allows travel to previously inaccessible areas of Nadiria.

helipad.name: HeliPad
helipad.description: A convenient communications contraption conceived by Dr Helix Helix himself. It seems everyone has one these days.

heros_cloak.name: Hero's Cloak
heros_cloak.description: Attack＋10, Defence＋10, Max HP＋30, Bang Ward, Crack Ward,Frizz Ward

trainees_badge.name: Trainee's Badge
trainees_badge.description: Increases the amount of experience gained.

trainees_medal.name: Trainee's Medal
trainees_medal.description: Greatly increases the amount of experience gained.
